name: Unwind (Thomas Martin, Stevenkudos1, ValeryCrow, deadfish1225)
description:
A relaxing puzzler about making DNA coils out of little cells! Part Minesweeper, part Concentration, all chill.

  • Click on a cell to unlock its protein - every two proteins get added to the DNA coil
  • Matching proteins give different scoring effects (there are 4), and incorrectly matched proteins have adverse effects.
  • Pair eight proteins in a row to complete the coil and bank your points.
  • Incorrectly match three pairs and you'll lose a life and start the coil again.
  • Each cell has up to four 'helper' proteins that tell you which protein hides in the adjacent cells.

Tom Martin - Programming 

Jacky Cheong - Programming

Shiqian Zhang - Art/Animation

Valery Voronkova - Art 

Tom Bradshaw - Audio
